Um jogo muito bom para os amantes de jogos competitivos, porem depois que ficou gratuito o número de hacker aumentou infinitamente.

The Game itself is pretty good. One of the most solid tactical shooters out there.
However, the skill ceiling for this game is pretty high. As long as you play casual it's alright, but playing Comp will often and quickly lead you to the worst part of the game; the Community.
And while not everyone in this game is toxic, a lot of people are, especially if you're not on the same skill level as them.

My experience with this game has sadly been on the more toxic side of things, with most of my matches spent with people insulting or kicking me.

If you're good at ignoring people and / or don't care much about toxic behaivour, I'd say you don't have to worry. It's still a very fun and well designed game. It's on so many top lists and recommendations for a reason after all.
